data.eml:eml: Revision of some types of Philonthus Stephens and Gabrius Stephens from southern South America (Coleoptera: Staphylinidae), with nomenclatural notes

This dataset contains the digitized treatments in Plazi based on the original journal article Maus, Mariana Chani-Posse De (2009): Revision of some types of Philonthus Stephens and Gabrius Stephens from southern South America (Coleoptera: Staphylinidae), with nomenclatural notes. Zootaxa 2034: 31-42, DOI: 10.5281/zenodo.186351
